FAQs:
Q: Do you rent these servers ?
A: No, IPstrada LLC own their own hardware.

Q. Do you oversell ?
A. Absolutely not, we are looking to serve customer for a long period of time by providing optimum quality and performance. We believe overselling is for fly by night companies oversell the capacity resulting in degraded performance.

Q: How long have you been in business ?
A: IPstrada has been in business since late 2008.

Q: What payment types are accepted
A: Currently we only accept paypal as our primary payment method, google checkout & moneybookers coming soon.

Q: Do you offer msn or phone support
A: We currently only offer email support and ticket system from client area in portal.

Q: Where are your servers located?
A: All our servers are colocated in Fort Worth Datacenter.

Q: Do you offer any web control panels?
A: Currently no. We are discussing our options with vendors right now. You are more than welcome to bring in your own license and have us install/configure it for you.

Q: Do we have to use proxies ?
A: Yes use of proxies is required to avoid termination



============
More questions? Please feel free to open a ticket with our Sales department or email us!
============

============
NOT ALLOWED ON OUR NETWORK
